articles.author: Michelle Jamrisko, Cynthia Li
articles.title: Singapore Plans Massive Budget Stimulus to Counter Virus Threat
articles.description: Singapore is set to deliver a strong budget this week to offset the damage to the economy from the coronavirus, with analysts predicting the biggest deficit in almost two decades.
articles.content:
People wearing protective masks cross a road in the central business district of Singapore on Feb. 10.
Singapore is set to deliver a strong budget this week to offset the damage to the economy from the coronavirus, with analysts predicting the biggest defici… [+4890 chars]

Xi Details Hands-On Approach in Virus Fight From Early January
articles.description: China released a two-week-old speech showing President Xi Jinping was leading the national effort to contain the coronavirus, in an apparent effort to quell public anger over the handling of the outbreak.
articles.content:
China released a two-week-old speech showing President Xi Jinping was leading the national effort to contain the coronavirus, in an apparent effort to quell public anger over the handling of the outbreak.
